data.post_text: This is a referendumV2 whose proposer address (13oPHqA8Us9duK1tj5ozaUrgt28bRLPE9YAoqV1zCZdWQncH) is shown in on-chain info below. Only this user can edit this description and the title. If you own this account, login and tell us more about your proposal.

comment.text_comment:
For some reason I can't edit the proposal, but here's the link for the full version on SubSquare.
https://polkadot.subsquare.io/referenda/referendum/11
I'll get in contact with the other signers so they can edit here.
This proposal was submitted as a treasury.proposespend() instead of a treasury.spend()

data.post_text:
Dear Polkadot Community,
Polkashots.io was the first snapshot service for validators and node operators available since Early 2021. During its time, it provided a valuable service to validators and Parity engineers alike, that ensured reliability of our network.
There is a new mechanism, Warp Sync, that makes this service redundant, therefore we stopped making new snapshots in April 2023. We are seeking the reimbursment of Google Cloud expenses for the Jan-Apr period as well as the deposit for the Gov1 Proposal replaced by this. The total is 3,936.69 DOT.
All details can be found in the proposal page:
https://hackmd.io/@nicolasochem/B19RK5lmh
Thank you very much for your consideration
